sample_fails_v1.q: Can I return the Everyday Tee?
sample_fails_v1.out: You can return the Everyday Tee within 30 days if unused and in original packaging.

sample_fails_v1.q: Is the Weekend Hoodie returnable if worn once?
sample_fails_v1.out: You can return the Weekend Hoodie within 30 days if unused and in original packaging.

sample_fails_v1.q: I bought the clearance Weekend Hoodie yesterday—can I exchange sizes?
sample_fails_v1.out: You can return the Weekend Hoodie within 30 days if unused and in original packaging.

sample_passes_v2.q: Can I return the Aurora Dress if it doesn't fit?
sample_passes_v2.out: You can return the Aurora Dress within 30 days if unused and in original packaging.
You can return items within 30 days of delivery.

sample_passes_v2.q: If I return unused City Sneakers, how long until I get a refund?
sample_passes_v2.out: Refunds are issued within 5–10 business days after inspection.
